kindly.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Mr Nunn has kindly agreed to let us use his barn for the dance.
kindly.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a word meaning ‘please’, which is often used when you are annoyed
kindly.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Will you kindly put that book back?
kindly.translation[1].definitions[0].def: kind and caring for other people
kindly.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Mrs Gardiner was a kindly old soul.
